description:
A pot with thoughtful details for successful cooking. The hard anodized aluminum distributes heat evenly and cleans easily. Silicone pads on the lid let you use the integrated strainer without scalding your thumbs. 2 sizes let you pick the right capacity for your group.

  • Halulite™ hard anodized aluminum is lightweight and highly abrasion resistant
  • Dual locking bail handles for easy handling
  • Mesh stuff sack included
name: GSI Halulite Pot
